#summary About this project

= About this project =

== Other versions ==

This project is based on [https://code.google.com/p/two-finger-scroll/ two-finger-scroll] by Arkadiusz Wahlig.

two-finger-scroll has spawned a few other versions as well: [http://forum.tabletpcreview.com/hp-touchsmart-tm2-wacom/38405-twofingerscroll-v1-0-7-update-two-finger-scrolling-done-right-more.html `MacHater`'s version on tabletpcreview.com] and a version with  [https://code.google.com/p/two-finger-scroll/issues/detail?id=19#c13 2D scrolling and Windows 8 support]

== JUCE ==

JUCE is the GUI framework used, it provides a cross-platform GUI toolkit and lots of other useful classes. Learn more at http://rawmaterialsoftware.com/.
